page.title: 12A DAY AT WINTERINGHAM SCHOOL
page.content: The bell rings at 9am but my mum brings me to school before then. We meet my friends as we walk up to school. When the bell rings we go to assembly where we sing and say prayers. Sometimes parents are invited to a play. Afterwards we do maths, English reading or art. I enjoy reading best. At playtime we can sometimes play on the grass, some people play on roller boots. At dinner time some people have school dinners, I have a packed lunch. We have recorder club or computer club at lunchtime. Before we go home we have a story. The infants go home at 3.3o and the juniors have games or music until 4pm. Some people stay for computer club. When I get home I have my tea, watch TV or play out on my bike with my brother.
